articles.title: The world's first PlayStation 5 'Slim' now exists thanks to a YouTuber - The Verge
articles.description: A DIY TouTuber has created a PS5 “Slim” model. It houses the power supply and cooling in a separate unit, allowing the main PS5 components to sit inside a device that’s less than an inch thick.
